sentences: SBI considered this agenda item on Tuesday, 12 September.

Delegates adopted a draft decision on the matter for adoption by COP-6 (FCCC/SBI/2000/L.3), which accepts with gratitude the offer of the Kingdom of Morocco to host COP-7 and decides that it will be held in Marrakech from 29 October - 9 November 2001.
enb_long_title: Thirteenth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies of the UNFCCC
